synopsis.text: Tsukasa's dreams of figure skating glory were shattered, leaving him in the world of ice dancing, a far cry from his original ambition. Meanwhile, young Inori Yuitsuka, a fifth-grader with a burning passion for skating, is dismissed by everyone around her as a lost cause due to her late start. However, when their paths cross at Tsukasa's rink, he sees a reflection of his own passion and unfulfilled dreams in her eyes. Determined not to let Inori suffer the same fate, Tsukasa takes on the challenge of coaching her, vowing to help her achieve the medal-winning success she yearns for. As they embark on this journey together, they share a common dream and an unyielding determination that may just be their ticket to the world's stage. Will Inori's dream of Olympic glory become a reality, or will it remain a distant dream? Join them in this emotional and thrilling ride through the world of figure skating.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
